alfabet_instructions_practice: Choose a letter to hear it. When you're ready, click the "Start Game" button to test your skill.
ditofdat_practice_instructions: Choose words from the pairs below to hear them.
about_oss: This site is open-source software, for details see the license file in {repo}.
about_description: This site is here to help you practice parts of the Dutch language. It is created by some friends in Belgium who are taking a Dutch 1.1 class.
description_alfabet: This game helps you learn how to pronounce the letters of the Dutch alphabet!
description_ditofdat: This games helps you to learn the difference between the long and short Dutch vowel sounds!
